name: Splash Text!
description: Minecraft-style splashes in the main menu!

extra-splash-file.name: Extra Splashes
extra-splash-file.description: Additional splash texts, one per line. Restart your game to apply. See more info about writing these on the GitHub page!

splash-rotation.name: Splash Text Rotation
splash-rotation.description: The rotation for the splash in the main menu. Default is -20

scaling-speed.name: Splash Text Scaling Speed
scaling-speed.description: The speed at which the splash text scales in the main menu. Default is 1

disable-default-splash.name: Disable Default Splashes
disable-default-splash.description: Disabled the build-in splashes from appearing. Useful if you want only your custom splashes to appear. Requires restart.
